detail_desc: Short vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a racer back.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with elasticated hems.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Short-sleeved top in slub-knit cotton jersey with a motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, ribbed stand-up collar, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the cardigan is organic.
Tube scarf in a soft knit with a wrapover front. Length approx. 34 cm, circumference approx. 55 cm.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Small shoulder bag in woven fabric with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. Foldover flap and an adjustable tab with a plastic fastener at the front. One outer compartment with a hook and loop fastener at the front, one zipped outer compartment at the back and one inner compartment. Two loops at the back to attach the bag, for example, to a belt. Lined. Size approx. 3.5x16.5x20 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton. Top in soft jersey with short sleeves. Shorts in woven fabric with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Ankle boots with pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless jersey romper suit in soft organic cotton with a press-stud on one shoulder, yoke, press-studs at the crotch and ribbed hems.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Ballet slippers in imitation suede with a decorative bow at the front and a glittery elastic strap over the foot. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and soft rubber soles.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Gently fitted, knee-length dress in a viscose weave with a slight sheen. Short, frilled, raw-edge sleeves, a concealed zip at the back and a bell-shaped skirt with a sturdy flounce at the hem. Lined.
Sweatpants in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and straight legs.
Ankle-length, 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and kick-flare legs.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, A-line skirt in washed denim with a raw-edge hem.
Gently tailored jacket in a woven viscose blend with notch lapels, a button at the front, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Joggers in a cashmere knit with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, drawstring hood, zip down the front, two-part kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.

Lightly padded popover jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a quilted lower section. Hood with a high collar and a zip with a chin guard at the top. Front pocket with a concealed zip and a kangaroo pocket. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs and a zip at one side of the hem. Elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Short necklace in heavy metal chain. Adjustable length 47-54 cm.
Sports top in marled, fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and visible seams.
Cap in scuba fabric and mesh with a print motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Off-the-shoulder top in a stretch weave with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton corduroy with a regular, adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and straight, wide legs.

Wide, boxy jacket in hard-washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides of the hem.
Tube scarf in a soft, fine knit.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Shorter, fitted top in a fine rib knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves.

Padded jacket in windproof and water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, a high collar and a zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a zipped inner pocket and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Partly lined.
T-shirt in a soft slub cotton jersey and viscose blend with a deep V-neck at the front and seam centre back.

Shirt in a cotton herringbone weave with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket, chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turned-up hem, earflaps with a soft faux fur lining, and ties under the chin.
Shirt in woven fabric with a grandad collar, classic front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

Padded, knee-length jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip, and long raglan sleeves. The filling is made from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Padded slippers in soft velour with appliqués and bells. Soles with anti-slip protectors.
Trousers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with a print and appliqués on the knees and ribbed hems.
Wide top in soft cotton and modal jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Cap in patterned cotton jersey with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey with stripes in glittery thread, a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and short slits at the hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Patterned mesh trainers with a hook and loop tab over the foot, elasticated lacing at the front, a padded top edge and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
Small weekend bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top, an adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x35x42 cm.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed silicone trim at the top. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and fake welt pockets at the back. Concealed zip in one side and tapered legs with creases. Lined at the top.
Underwired bra in lace and mesh with cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Gloves with suede uppers and leather underneath. Knitted lining.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Short, straight-style T-shirt in soft jersey with ribbing around the neckline and an embroidered motif at the top. The cotton content of the T-shirt is organic.
Thin Alice band in metal with plastic pearly beads.
Short, fitted cold shoulder dress in a patterned weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Large plastic earrings with rectangular pendants. Length 8.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a lace detail at the top, low waist, ties at the sides and a gathered seam at the back.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and back pocket. Legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed viscose jersey with 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey in a straight cut with high slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved dress in printed sweatshirt fabric with a seam at the hips and gently flared, pleated skirt in woven fabric.

Shirt in a viscose and cotton blend with a turn-down collar and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Block-coloured polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket, short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.

Set with a T-shirt and denim shorts. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Slim-fit, 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.

Jacket in sturdy jersey with quilted sections at the top and on the sleeves. Mesh-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Seam with fringing at the top that continues down the sleeves.
